attributes.action: Legal driving age 13 if they meet height requirement
attributes.additional_details: It helps teens get around and most teens have bank accounts and free will anyway so it would help them so much to have a car
attributes.background: The govt should lower driving age to 13 if they are restricted to hatchbacks / low cars and if they meet a height requirement like 5”10

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646170
